comments.content: Marking as critical since it's a tempest failure
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~abhishek-i

comments.content:
It is incorrectly reported by tempest (fixed), the usual root cause is the instance remained 'image_uploading' state.
Probably it happens when  you do multiple snapshot from the same instance with minimal delay.

Now is the instance remain in 'image_uploading' status does not causes a failure, but it should.

See also: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tempest/+bug/1257641
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~afazekas

comments.content: Saying a tempest test failed is too vague of an error and is most likely a duplicate of another bug.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo
